main event: On September 13, 1952, a civilian pilot reported an unusual aerial object near Allentown, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The object was described as large and elliptical, moving at high speed., The pilot lost visual contact as the object pulled up with tremendous acceleration., The sighting had a very brief observation time but left considerable doubt about the nature of the object., The report mentioned that the object did not resemble any known aircraft., Multiple witnesses observed the object and reported it did not appear to be intelligently controlled.
sighted object: unusual aerial object, large and elliptical in shape
witness description: civilian pilot, inactive Air Force reserve captain
